Generate a Git commit message using only the standard types: `feat`, `fix`, `docs`, `style`, `refactor`, `test`, `chore`.  

The format must be strictly:
```
<type>: <short description of the change>
```

- The description should be concise, clear, and written in imperative mood.
- Avoid long technical details; keep only the essential.  
- Examples:  
  feat: add user login functionality  
  fix: correct navbar alignment on mobile  
  docs: update API usage instructions
